amendment.description: To provide additional funding for activities related to neonatal abstinence syndrome.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3912 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5903; text: CR S5903) To provide additional funding for activities related to neonatal abstinence syndrome.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3912 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3912 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
